com.silabs.bluetooth_mesh

Class BluetoothMeshNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silabs.bluetooth_mesh.BluetoothMeshNative

  • public class BluetoothMeshNative
extends java.lang.Object
    This class declare all the inputs to the Native Mesh Stack C API abstraction layer.

      BluetoothMeshNative()

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluetoothMeshNative

        public BluetoothMeshNative()

    • Method Detail

      • initBluetoothMesh

        public static void initBluetoothMesh()
        Native method that initialises the Bluetooth Mesh Library, this method is called when the BluetoothMesh object is created

      • deinitBluetoothMesh

        public static void deinitBluetoothMesh()
        Native method that deinitialises the Bluetooth Mesh Library. It is necessary to call this method when that the BluetoothMesh object is destroyed, i.e. from one activity to another, or when the app is closed

      • provisionDevice

        public static int provisionDevice(int net_index,
                                  byte[] uuid,
                                  int gattHandle,
                                  int mtu)
        Native method used to provision an unprovisioned device
        Parameters:
        net_index - Integer that contains the network index which the device will be attached
        uuid - byte array that contains the device's uuid (advertised by unprovisioned device)
        gattHandle - Integer that contains the handle for the GATT connection
        mtu - mtu size used during connection
        Returns:
        Integer containing the status of the operation

      • createNetwork

        public static int createNetwork(java.lang.String name,
                                byte[] net_key)
        Native method used to create a new network in the provisioner app
        Parameters:
        name - String containing the name of the Network
        net_key - byte array that represent the network key
        Returns:
        Integer containing errorcode

      • createAppkey

        public static int createAppkey(java.lang.String name,
                               int net_index,
                               byte[] app_key)
        Native method used to create an app key and send it to the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        Parameters:
        name - String containing the name of the AppKey (GROUP)
        net_index - Integer that contains the network index
        app_key - byte array that contains the full app key
        Returns:
        Integer that represents the app_index for this group in this network

      • deleteAppkey

        public static int deleteAppkey(int netkey_index,
                               int appkey_index)
        Native method used to delete and app_key from a network. It is called when the the wish is to delete a group from the network in the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        Parameters:
        netkey_index - Integer that represents the netkey_index
        appkey_index - Integer that represents the appkey_index in the network
        Returns:
        Integer containing the status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • bindLocalModels

        public static int bindLocalModels(int netkey_index,
                                  int appkey_index,
                                  int sub_address)
        Native method used to bind models from the group in the network
        Parameters:
        appkey_index - Integer that represents appkey_index in the network
        netkey_index - Integer that represents the netkey_index
        sub_address - Integer that represents the subscriber address
        Returns:
        Integer containing the status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • DCDRequest

        public static int DCDRequest(byte[] uuid)
        Native method that requests the device composition data from the node
        Parameters:
        uuid - byte array containing the device uuid
        Returns:
        Integer containing the status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • gattEvent

        public static void gattEvent(int gattHandle,
                             byte type,
                             byte[] data)
        Native method that sends to the native Mesh Stack every kind of event that happens in the GATT connection. It is responsible for let the native Mesh Stack knows if the device is connected, disconnected, of if the node is sending messages to the mobile.
        Parameters:
        gattHandle - Integer containing the handle of the gatt connection
        type - byte that specify the time of the event
        data - byte array containing the message sent from the node to the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        See Also:
        BluetoothMesh.mesh_gatt_event_connected, BluetoothMesh.mesh_gatt_event_disconnected, BluetoothMesh.mesh_gatt_event_data

      • initBluetoothMeshProxy

        public static int initBluetoothMeshProxy(int gattHandle,
                                         int mtu)
        Native method that tells to the Bluetooth Mesh Library that the app has connected GATT with a Bluetooth Mesh Proxy
        Parameters:
        gattHandle - Integer containing the handle of the gatt connection
        mtu - Integer containing the mtu of the connection
        Returns:
        Integer containing the status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • networkHashMatches

        public static int networkHashMatches(int net_index,
                                     byte[] adv_data)
        Native method that checks if the scanned device belongs to the Mesh Network
        Parameters:
        net_index - Integer that contains the index from the network
        adv_data - ScanRecord from the scanned device
        Returns:
        Integer containing the network key index of the network (-1 if didn't find)

      • deviceIdentityMatches

        public static int deviceIdentityMatches(byte[] adv_data,
                                        int mesh_address)
        Native method that checks if the scanned device is the device containing the given address
        Parameters:
        adv_data - byte array that contains the advertisement data from the node
        mesh_address - Integer that represents the node uuid
        Returns:
        Integer containing the status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • addToGroup

        public static int addToGroup(byte[] uuid,
                             int element,
                             int netkey_index,
                             int appkey_index,
                             int model,
                             int pub_address,
                             int sub_address)
        Native method responsible to add a node to a group in the Bluetooth Mesh Library NOTE: The developer must add the GroupInfo id in the DeviceInfo separately
        Parameters:
        uuid - byte array containing the device uuid which will be added to the group
        element - Integer containing the element that will the added to the group (app_key)
        netkey_index - Integer containing the network key ID
        appkey_index - Integer containing the application key ID
        model - Integer containing the Model ID from the given element
        pub_address - Integer that contains the publisher address
        sub_address - Integer that contains the subscriber address
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • removeFromGroup

        public static int removeFromGroup(byte[] uuid,
                                  int element,
                                  int netkey_index,
                                  int appkey_index,
                                  int model,
                                  int pub_address,
                                  int sub_address)
        Native method responsible to remove a node from a groups in the Bluetooth Mesh Library NOTE: If succeed, developer must remove Group Id from DeviceInfo
        Parameters:
        uuid - byte array containing device uuid which will be removed from the group
        element - Integer containing the element that will be removed from the group (app_key)
        netkey_index - Integer containing the network index ID
        appkey_index - Integer containing the application key ID
        model - Integer containing the Model ID from the given element
        pub_address - Integer that contains the publisher address
        sub_address - Integer that contains the subscriber address
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • setProxy

        public static int setProxy(byte[] uuid,
                           int net_index,
                           boolean enable)
        Native method responsible to change the device's proxy functionality status in the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        net_index - Integer containing the network key index
        enable - Boolean that selects if it enables or not the functionality
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • setRelay

        public static int setRelay(byte[] uuid,
                           int net_index,
                           boolean enable)
        Native method responsible to change the device's relay functionality status in the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        net_index - Integer containing the network key index
        enable - Boolean that selects if it enables or not the functionality
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • setFriend

        public static int setFriend(byte[] uuid,
                            int net_index,
                            boolean enable)
        Native method responsible to change the device's friend functionality status in the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        net_index - Integer containing the network key index
        enable - Boolean that selects if it enables or not the functionality
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • factoryResetDevice

        public static int factoryResetDevice(byte[] uuid,
                                     int net_index)
        Native method responsible for reset the node to the factory state (unprovisioned)
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        net_index - Integer containing the network key index
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • onoffSet

        public static int onoffSet(int uuid,
                           int appkey_index,
                           boolean status,
                           int transition_ms,
                           int delay_ms,
                           boolean request_reply,
                           boolean is_final)
        Native method responsible for change the device's on/off status (on/off model configured)
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        appkey_index - Integer containing the appkey index
        status - Boolean containing the wished status
        transition_ms - Integer containing the transition time, or zero for immediate change request
        delay_ms - delay between packets
        request_reply - Boolean that defines if the user would like to receive a status callback
        is_final - Boolean that defines if the packet is the final one
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • levelSet

        public static int levelSet(int uuid,
                           int appkey_index,
                           int level,
                           int transition_ms,
                           int delay_ms,
                           boolean request_reply,
                           boolean is_final)
        Native method responsible for change the device's level status
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        appkey_index - Integer containing the appkey index
        level - Integer containing the wished level
        transition_ms - Integer containing the transition time, or zero for immediate change request
        delay_ms - delay between packets
        request_reply - Boolean that defines if the user would like to receive a status callback
        is_final - Boolean that defines if the packet is the final one
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • dimmableSet

        public static int dimmableSet(int uuid,
                              int appkey_index,
                              int lightness,
                              int transition_ms,
                              int delay_ms,
                              boolean request_reply,
                              boolean is_final)
        Native method responsible for change the device's dimmable status
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        appkey_index - Integer containing the appkey index
        lightness - Integer containing the wished lightness level
        transition_ms - Integer containing the transition time, or zero for immediate change request
        delay_ms - delay between packets
        request_reply - Boolean that defines if the user would like to receive a status callback
        is_final - Boolean that defines if the packet is the final one
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • CTLSet

        public static int CTLSet(int uuid,
                         int appkey_index,
                         int lightness,
                         int temperature,
                         int deltauv,
                         int transition_ms,
                         int delay_ms,
                         boolean request_reply,
                         boolean is_final)
        Native method responsible for change the device's dimmable status
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        appkey_index - Integer containing the appkey index
        lightness - Integer containing the wished lightness level
        temperature - Integer containing the wished temperature color
        deltauv - Integer containing the wished delta UV level
        transition_ms - Integer containing the transition time, or zero for immediate change request
        delay_ms - delay between packets
        request_reply - Boolean that defines if the user would like to receive a status callback
        is_final - Boolean that defines if the packet is the final one
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • addressByUuid

        public static int addressByUuid(byte[] uuid)
        Native method that returns the device's mesh address
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        Returns:
        Integer containing the device's mesh address

      • requestDevKey

        public static byte[] requestDevKey(byte[] uuid)
        Native method that returns the mesh device key
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        Returns:
        Byte array containing the device key

      • oobAuthKey

        public static int oobAuthKey(byte[] uuid,
                             byte[] auth)
        Native method that sends the authentication key from the user to the Bluetooth Mesh Library
        Parameters:
        uuid - Integer containing the device UUID
        auth - Byte array containing the authentication key
        Returns:
        Integer containing status of the operation (0 is successful)

      • nidByIndex

        public static int nidByIndex(int net_index)
        Native method that returns the Network Identifier, useful to analyze the network packets with an network analyzer.
        Parameters:
        net_index - Integer containing the network index
        Returns:
        Integer containing the network identifier
